application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Single storey rear and side wrap around extension; and single storey detached rear garden outbuilding (following demolition of existing outbuilding)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 2220914-01 (Existing Plans, Elevations and Section); 2220914-1 Rev A (Proposed Plans, Elevations and Section) and 2220914-2 Rev A (Proposed Outbuilding).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7B and 7Cof Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).

| The single storey detached rear garden outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwellinghouse on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
